oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Results on smut resistance of winter barley varieties published
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Lorenz, N.
Spieß, H.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Crop health, quality, protection
Cereals, pulses and oilseeds
Breeding, genetics and propagation
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Resistance of winter barley against loose and covered smut has been checked in field experiments for several years at Dottenfelderhof near Frankfurt/Germany.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: European Consortium for Organic plant breeding (ECO-PB)
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Lorenz, N. and Spieß, H. (2008) Results on smut resistance of winter barley varieties published. Newsletter on organic seeds and plant breeding (II/2008), pp. 3-4.
